data.Name: Tori Amos - Ocean to Ocean Tour
data.Description: Please Note: The Event Organizer is requiring all attendees of this event to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 OR have received and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72-hours prior to entering the venue. In attending the event, you certify and attest that you and all individuals in your party attending the event will abide by the following regulations: By purchasing tickets for this event, I confirm that at the time of the event I will have been fully vaccinated (14 days past final vaccination dose), OR will have received and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72-hours of the event. Children under 12 years of age will not be required to provide proof of vaccination or a negative test but must wear a face mask at all times. Fans with a valid medical or religious note preventing vaccination will be required to receive and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72 hours of the event. Mask wearing will be required for everyone age 2 and older.

data.Name: Lord Huron 6/2
data.Description:
LORD HURON at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on June 3, 2021 has been rescheduled to June 2, 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.

 

AEG Presents is thrilled to announce LORD HURON live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Thursday, June 2nd, 2022.
